definition[0]: the most successful point in the development of something
example[0]: The Roman Empire reached its zenith around the year 100.
note[0]: reach its zenith/be at its zenith
definition[1]: the highest point that is reached by the Sun or the Moon in the sky
explanation[0]: Zenith sounds rather literary. In everyday English, people usually say peak:
example[1]: Her career was at its peak.
